SELECT zzjgdm, xzqhdm, dwbm, czqhbm, dwmc, pjdm, pjhm, zjhm, pjjym, xm, t.kprq, ywlsh, yljglx, xb, mzlsh, jzrq, yblx, ybbh, jjzf, qt, grzhzf, grxjzf, grzf, grzf_1, zje, fhrxm, skrxm, sfzf FROM sendpjmzsfzt t where 1=1 and t.pjdm is not null
and date_format (t.kprq,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format (#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format (t.kprq,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format (#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and CONVERT(pjhm,SIGNED) >= CONVERT(#{pjhms},SIGNED) and CONVERT(pjhm,SIGNED) <= CONVERT(#{pjhmj},SIGNED)
/*如果关键字不为空则根据关键字查询是否存在该*/
and t.pjhm like concat('%',#{queryStr},'%')
and t.pjhm in
#{pjhm}
order by pjhm
